SEARCH
Package com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.retrievers.worldname

Class MultiverseRetriever

java.lang.Object
com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.retrievers.worldname.MultiverseRetriever
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorldNameRetriever
public final class MultiverseRetriever extends Object implements WorldNameRetriever
A WorldNameRetriever implementation that retrieves the alias name of a World using the Multiverse-Core API.

This class interacts directly with MultiverseCore and its WorldManager to look up world metadata, including alias and display formatting. This implementation retrieves a world alias or name using Multiverse version 5.

If the world is not managed by Multiverse, or if any part of the plugin's world management system is unavailable, this retriever returns null.

Typically used internally by MultiverseResolver, and not intended to be used directly unless fine-grained access to Multiverse aliases is needed.

See Also:
